name: DogBook
text: A landing page with a button that redirects you to the home page where you will have several cards of dog breeds with an image and information, has filters, sorting, a search input by name and pagination, clicking on the image of a dog redirects you to the detail where the remaining information is displayed, also has a creation form where you can create a dog.

name: Vibes
text: E-commerce of clothing. It has a user register and login, a home page where you can see the products, a cart to add products to buy, payment gateway, a user profile where you can edit your information, an administrator dashboard, among other features.

name: E-comerce Platzi
text: A web application created with React and using Webpack as a packager. Only the home view. This activity was done through a Platzi course.

name: Batatabyte
text: HTML and CSS structure of a mobile cryptocurrency application. This activity was done through a Platzi course.
